titles.title: FACT Act of 2016
Federal Agency Complete Transparency Act of 2016
To amend title 5, United States Code, to require a general notice of proposed rule making for a major rule to include a cost-benefit analysis of the proposed rule, and for other purposes.
FACT Act of 2016

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Federal Agency Complete Transparency Act of 2016 or the FACT Act of 2016
This bill amends the Administrative Procedure Act to require a general notice of proposed rule making for a major rule (e.g., a rule that has an annual effect on the economy of $100 million or more) to include a cost-benefit analysis of the proposed rule.
